means: 下车，下马( dismount的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Emma dismounted and took her horse's bridle.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃玛下了马，拉着马笼头。

sentence.Network_en: I dismounted and began to push my bicycle up the hill.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从自行车下来,开始推着上坡.

PerfectNetExp.abs: dismounted 下车的, dismounted 卸下的, dismounted 下马的
dismountablemast 可拆卸天线杆, dismounted 下马的, dismounted 下车的
and dismounted and set the keyboard on the floor ., 下了自行车 , 将键盘放在地板上.
dismountable 可拆除的, dismounted 下车的, dismountablemast 可拆卸天线杆

list.abs: dismountable anchor 可拆锚dismountable mast 可拆桅dismounting 拆卸
dismount 拆卸dismountable installation 可卸装置dismountable 可拆卸的
dismount 拆卸dismounting device 拆卸装置；装石器dispersant 分散剂

entry.def: If you dismount from a horse or a bicycle, you get down from it.

example.ex: Emma dismounted and took her horse's bridle.
example.tran: 埃玛下了马，拉着马笼头。

auth_sentence.content: The men dismounted and set the school on fire.
auth_sentence.res_content: The men dismounted and set the school on fire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The men dismounted and set the school on fire.

auth_sentence.content: They had dismounted to ask papers of the driver of a cart.
auth_sentence.res_content: They had dismounted to ask papers of the driver of a cart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They had dismounted to ask papers of the driver of a cart.

auth_sentence.content: Looks Like Trouble was pulled up near the end and jockey Richard Johnson dismounted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Looks Like Trouble was pulled up near the end and jockey Richard Johnson dismounted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Looks Like Trouble was pulled up near the end and jockey Richard Johnson dismounted.
